text: Deεn na εha mo a enti monnyi (moagyapadeε) wͻ Nyankopͻn kwan soͻ? Aberε nso a Nyankopͻn na ͻsoro ne asaase so akoradeε wͻ no? Momu wͻn a wͻ’yii (wͻn agyapadeε) na wͻ’koeε ansa na nkonimdie no (reba no, ne wͻn a aka no) nnsε. Woi nom na wͻn wͻ gyinaberε a εsoo paa mu kyεn wͻn a (nkonimdie no) akyi na wͻ’yii wͻn (agyapadeε) na wͻ’koeε no. Na mmom Nyankopͻn (de ade) papa ahyε wͻn nyinaa bͻ. Nyankopͻn ne dwuma a modie nyinaa ho Amanebͻfoͻ
